briefTitle: Study of the Safety and Effectiveness of JUVÉDERM VOLUX™ XC Injectable Gel for Restoring Jawline Definition
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Evaluator-blinded, Randomized, Parallel-group, Controlled Study of the Safety and Effectiveness of JUVÉDERM VOLUX™ XC Injectable Gel for Restoring Jawline Definition
summary: This study will evaluate the safety and effectiveness of JUVÉDERM VOLUX™ XC injectable gel for restoring jawline definition

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants Who Show ≥ 1-point Jawline Improvement on Both Sides From Baseline on the Allergan Loss of Jawline Definition Scale (ALJDS)
